mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(email, password, j_desc, name, status, create_date_time, salt) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{desc}, #{name}, '01', now(), #{salt});
mapper.select: SELECT user_id as "userId", email, password, j_desc as "desc", name, status, salt, create_date_time as "createDateTime", update_date_time as "updateDateTime" FROM users WHERE email = #{email};
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET password=#{password}, j_desc=#{desc}, status=#{status}, salt=#{salt}, update_date_time = now() WHERE email = #{email};
